steps.title: Download Core Modules
steps.message: Install core modules from online repositories. This step requires internet connection.

steps.title: Sideload Core Modules
steps.message: Install core modules from local repositories. This step requires that the modules are located in the 'node_modules' folder.

steps.title: Download UI Framework
steps.message: Download necessary UI frameworks and libraries from online repositories. Skipping this step may affect how some views appear.

steps.title: Sideload UI Framework
steps.message: Sideload necessary UI frameworks and libraries from local (node_modules) repository. Skipping this step may affect how some views appear.

steps.title: Download Core Apps
steps.message: Install core apps from online repositories. This step requires internet connection.

steps.title: Sideload Core Apps
steps.message: Install core apps from local repositories. This step requires that the apps are located in the 'node_modules' folder.
